name: Hot Lava Floor
description:
Hot Lava floor is a first person action game that transport you back your childhood imagination. Customize your player and then run, jump, go through intricate levels, find new routes to find the source of the lava leak. Now the floor is real lava!

Features:
- Boiling lava
- View from the third and first-person
- Beautiful 3D-graphics
- Easy controlls
- The highest level of design
- Non-linear levels
- Character Customization
- Support Bluetooth controllers

In developing:
- Multiplayer
- Online high scores
- More levels
- More skins
- New characters
